nodes.name: Read Scraped Leads
nodes.notes: Reads all leads from Google Sheets where status = 'scraped'. These are leads from workflow 01 that haven't been processed yet.

nodes.name: Extract Domain
nodes.notes: Extracts clean domain from website URL (strips protocol, www, path)

nodes.name: Hunter.io Domain Search
nodes.notes: Calls Hunter.io Domain Search API to find email addresses for this domain. Returns up to 10 emails with confidence scores.

nodes.name: Extract Best Email
nodes.notes: Picks the best email from Hunter.io results. Prioritizes personal over generic, then by confidence score. If none found, passes empty email for fallback.

nodes.name: Handle Hunter Error
nodes.notes: Handles Hunter.io API failures. Logs the raw error and passes the lead through with empty email so the fallback scraper can try.

nodes.name: Email Found?
nodes.notes: Routes leads: if Hunter found an email → update sheet. If not → try fallback contact page scraper.

nodes.name: Scrape Contact Pages
nodes.notes: Multi-path fallback: tries homepage + 6 common Latvian contact page paths. Extracts emails via regex, prefers domain-matching emails. Stops at first hit.

nodes.name: Mark as Email Found
nodes.notes: Sets status to email_found for leads where Hunter.io returned an email

nodes.name: Update Google Sheet
nodes.notes: Updates each lead row in the Google Sheet with: email, status (email_found or no_email), email_source, email_confidence. Matches by restaurant name.

nodes.name: Summary
nodes.notes: Final summary: how many emails found vs not found
